title: Visma-Lease a Bike Braces for Unknown in Tour de France Without Roglič: ‘It Will Be an Interesting Summer’
content:
Insiders remain upbeat that Visma-Lease a Bike will thrive without 'king' Roglič, but its grip on the Tour de France is at threat.

Read the full article at Visma-Lease a Bike Braces for Unknown in Tour de France Without Roglič: ‘It Will Be an Interesting Summer’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
